text:
August 2, 1956
Mr. M. S. Novik
Boom 500
300 West 23rd Street
New York 11, New York
Dear Maury:
Got your wire. Also rechecked file of previous
reports. Have reported to FAE 11 consultations. I
added Wisconsin and Detroit to the list of nine you
wired.
Sorry for the pressure-on top of all youâ€™ve
been going through. You and Alice are bricks to
find time to get at this at a time like this. Will
expect your narrative one in a couple of days.
Meanwhile tables and rest of report going on stencil.
Our best.
HJSicb
Harry J. Skomia
Executive Director
